Factor Model (Maximum likelihood)

Source: vignettes/estimators_factor_model_ml.qmd

Parametrization

Loss

loss=n2(plog(2π)+logdet(Ŝ(θ))+Ŝ(θ)−1S) loss = \frac{n}{2} \, \left( p\log(2\pi) + \log\det\big(\hat{S}(\theta)\big) + \hat{S}(\theta)^{-1} S \right)

Gradient

ΔŜ(θ)=n2Ŝ(θ)−1(I−SŜ(θ)−1) \Delta_{\hat{S}(\theta)} = \frac{n}{2} \, \hat{S}(\theta)^{-1} \left( I - S \; \hat{S}(\theta)^{-1} \right)

Differential of the gradient

∂Ŝ(θ)−1=−Ŝ(θ)−1∂Ŝ(θ)Ŝ(θ)−1 \partial \hat{S}(\theta)^{-1} = -\hat{S}(\theta)^{-1} \, \partial \hat{S}(\theta) \, \hat{S}(\theta)^{-1}

∂ΔŜ(θ)=n2∂Ŝ(θ)−1(I−SŜ(θ)−1)−Ŝ(θ)−1(S∂Ŝ(θ)−1) \partial\Delta_{\hat{S}(\theta)} = \frac{n}{2} \, \partial \hat{S}(\theta)^{-1} \left( I - S \; \hat{S}(\theta)^{-1} \right) - \hat{S}(\theta)^{-1} \left( S \; \partial \hat{S}(\theta)^{-1} \right)

Hessian

HŜ(θ)=n2Ŝ(θ)−1SŜ(θ)−1⊗Ŝ(θ)1+Ŝ(θ)1⊗Ŝ(θ)−1SŜ(θ)−1−Ŝ(θ)−1⊗Ŝ(θ)−1 \begin{aligned} H_{\hat{S}(\theta)} = \; \frac{n}{2} \, &\hat{S}(\theta)^{-1} S \; \hat{S}(\theta)^{-1} \otimes \hat{S}(\theta)^{1} \;+ \\ &\hat{S}(\theta)^{1} \otimes \hat{S}(\theta)^{-1} S \; \hat{S}(\theta)^{-1} \; - \\ &\hat{S}(\theta)^{-1} \otimes \hat{S}(\theta)^{-1} \end{aligned}
